turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like you to order me a coffee please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Starbucks on Florence Blvd. in Casa Grande?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes - that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you know what you want now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I do. Are you ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Grande Iced Black and White Mocha with whole milk and no whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want anything else from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: When do you want it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about if it's ready before I enter my meeting @ 3?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So like in your hand by 2:50?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep - perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How are we paying for this?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They have me on account already.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok - while I'm out in that area is there anything else you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I appreciate your asking though.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there a second option you want if they don't have it? It's seasonal and sometimes they're out of those.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good thinking. Just an iced house coffee, grande sized, with cream and one equal.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. I'll have the receipt sent to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem.
